Platform SDK Java 9.0 API Reference

Uses of Package
com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls

  • Packages that use com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls 
    Package Description
    com.genesyslab.platform.applicationblocks.commons.protocols  
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.configuration
    Provides helper classes that read application options and other data from Configuration Server, converts it to corresponding Platform SDK objects and makes it easier to set up connections to backend servers and other applications.
    com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls
    Provides classes to support and configure TLS connections.
    com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol
    Contains classes that support the Protocol objects used by applications developed with the Platform SDKs.
    com.genesyslab.platform.configuration.protocol
    This package contains the Protocol classes that your applications can use to set up communication with Configuration Server.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls used by com.genesyslab.platform.applicationblocks.commons.protocols 
    Class Description
    SSLExtendedOptions
    Container for extended SSLContext/SSLEngine options.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls used by com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.configuration 
    Class Description
    PropertyReader
    Defines contract for configuration reader objects; ones that extract configuration option values from different sources of configuration data.
    SSLExtendedOptions
    Container for extended SSLContext/SSLEngine options.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls used by com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls 
    Class Description
    PropertyReader
    Defines contract for configuration reader objects; ones that extract configuration option values from different sources of configuration data.
    SSLExtendedOptions
    Container for extended SSLContext/SSLEngine options.
    TLSConfiguration
    Describes TLS configuration options used in Genesys products deployment and supported by PSDK Commons.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls used by com.genesyslab.platform.commons.protocol 
    Class Description
    SSLExtendedOptions
    Container for extended SSLContext/SSLEngine options.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.tls used by com.genesyslab.platform.configuration.protocol 
    Class Description
    TLSConfigurator
    Designed to allow completion customization of TLSConfiguration instance.
